title: Luciferianism
description: A philosophical religious roguelike, the firstwork penned in the Luciferian canon, it takes place in the Netherworld. Explore a vast open world, encounter all the strange people, creatures, demons and God's that inhabit this odd land of dreams. April is the cruellest month.
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# A Vast Environment Rich Labyrinthine Religious Aphorism, Inspired by the philosophy of Nietzche and Plato, one man's passion project & dream
<!--text-->
The song of the souls cast down into Hell,
Lucifer's Dream.

A downloadable religious tome. 

Say Yes,
by the way...

A Psychic Tarot Card, it is intended to be the firstwork in the Luciferian canon. Inspired by games like the FEAR & HUNGER series, it is an indie roguelike open world rpg set in a Labyrintine Nightmare called artifice, the construct world. The simulation world.

Luciferianism

Welcome to Artifice.

“Luciferianism is a roguelike rpg, and an open world sandbox, about power, set in a variety of modern and other settings, Ranging from Urban Cityscapes, to Ancient Japanese Temples, Real Chinese Locations appear in some form, from Aberdeen’s criminal underbelly, to Wan Chai, The Golden Quarter and the Lucky Charm Quarter, which are now futuristic slums full of high technology, vice and violence, and sleazy nightclubs. Further to the northwest you’ll find Medieval locations like medieval towns, Huge Cathedral Complexes, churches, and underground locations, as well as The Tree of the Knowledge of Good and Evil, The Garden of Eden, and Heaven if you get far enough. Huge Sprawling Medieval Castles, Large Complex Cities, military bases, tropical paradises, snowy wastelands, apocalyptic zones filled with destroyed buildings and monsters everywhere, and Cthulhu’s Palace. Huge sprawling forests, buddhist temples, Tokyo and Japan locations, From any and every time period.

Fully Voiced Dialogue
An Enormous Gigantic Open World
Brutal Crushing Difficulty
60+ Enemy Types and Variants
70 npcs
5 Player Characters
Melee - Ranged - Magic - Gun Combat
A Religiously Inspired Story
Blood and Gore, and dismemberment
Crude Comedy
3 to 6 hours of gameplay
Plenty of Replay Value
CCG Card Game Minigame
Tac/Tank/Jet Based Combat Minigame

An interesting story, told in part by setting and mechanics, you can make your own way in this world, you can find your own objective and pursue it, there are no hard objectives in this game, it is an open world sandbox, where you can make your own goals.



A huge array of characters, including Buddha, God, Jesus, Sophia (wisdom), the 4 luminaries, Meryl the Witch, Mango Mom, The Lady of the Cathedral, Jade Emperor, Wukong, Rabbit, Officer Frank, Chip the pirate girl, and all sorts of other people, 

As well as common dialogue npcs, and random people you meet along the way, all voicework done by AI Voice Robots.





Dozens and dozens of enemy types, ranging from fat exploding zombies, to university schoolgirls, to I'm Ric, to losers, punks, SCUM, otherworldly titans, orcs and goblins, angels, zombies in armor with swords, sword, arrow, magic and gun combat, witches up in the town to the north,

Where something hides behind it, ghosts, blue slimes, God’s sentry’s, wraiths, and a large range of human enemies as well. All characters in the game are fightable and killable. All named characters except 2 are vulnerable to permadeath.

Yes grasshopper,

That means you can kill God like it’s a JRPG or something,

Or you can just talk to him….

You make your own objectives in this game. 



A beautiful array of about 30 GB of Music, chosen usually but not always at random from a series of 95 playlists. Everything from 16 bit jrpg music, to lofi techno, light rock, rpg music, Asian and Chinese Songs, and selections from all sorts of different genres.



5 characters to find and choose from, and they all speak philosophy. With the simple press of one button, you can make your character start speaking philosophy, or reading literature, there is approximately 5-10 hours of readings from ancient and recent works of philosophy like Plato[The Allegory of the Cave],  Nietzsche[Thus Spake Zarathustra, The Antichrist, The Will To Power], Freud, as well as classics of Chinese literature in Journey to the West, Don Quixote my dead dad's favorite book when he was dying, there are also bible readings, readings from The Odyssey, Brikabrak Occult Works like The Golden Bough, Shakespeare, The Tale of Genji, Bram Stoker's Dracula, and lots more. All kinds of different book readings, which go nicely with the music. The Characters are A Cute Witch, A University Schoolgirl, A Valkyrie Warrior with a big attitude, Wukong, and Officer Frank.”

This game sings the song of Lucifer.

This game was made by one person,

Not a huge company or a large team,

One guy.

My main competition is the FEAR AND HUNGER series,

I am not intending to go toe to toe with great works like Deus Ex Human Revolution, Persona 4 & 5, Yakuza 0, Pathologic, The Shin Megami Tensei Series, Or Final Fantasy 7, which could only be made by a team of hundreds, This instead is about a single person’s vision and achievements, no boardroom no hr department approved this game, I did not censor myself, I made exactly the kind of game I always wanted to make. I am one man making my game myself so I can tell my story.

I believe it is a great work of art.



Also included is a multiplayer CCG Collectable Card Game Minigame, Full of weird and bizarre cards, and an arcade shooter minigame with Tanks, Tactical Shooter, and Aerial Combat based multiplayer.



PS: The maker of this game is a person with Schizophrenia,

It is my hope that if people play this game and like it,

It might improve negative perceptions people have about us.

A few years ago, in 2021, my wife and I separated when she was still pregnant, at the time of writing I have not yet met my son, part of the reason we split up was because she didn’t think game design was a good career. One third of all profits from this game will be sent directly to my wife and young son.

This work is not intended to offend or upset Christians. This work is deeply rooted in Christian mythology, and I have a great admiration for the bible. I like Christians, and a Christian saved my life when I was at my worst point. Rather I just wish to tell my story. In a certain tradition, they believe Lucifer repented to God and was forgiven, and now he lives in Heaven again. I feel this is in the spirit of the Christian message, that no sin is unforgivable, and that there is no one who does not deserve kindness. This is not intended to be an attack on Christianity. It is a celebration of all religions. Inspired by the Gnostic Texts, The Philosophy of Scott Adams, and the Scott Adams Simulation Theory, The Bible, Buddhist Philosophy, informed by the Hindu religion, Deism, Norse and Roman Religion, Luciferianism and Satanism in various forms, and the teachings of Morgue. As well as modern religious philosophy found in games like the Shin Megami Tensei series.

If all goes well I hope to make an Expanded Edition/Sequel using the same game world, just adding extra content.

Built for Challenge Runs: [Your first run determines your fortune and destination.] (HIGHER DESTINATIONS TAKE PRIORITY.)
(A) Talk to God without cheating. (You will be God of your own universe.)
(B) Unlock the Meryl Character (a warrior's soul, fit for Valhalla)
(C) Listen to the allegory of the cave, on the stone wall at the top of Meryl's Castle as Rabbit (infinite recurring reincarnations)
(D) You play for less than 10 minutes and die in Wan Chai (Chinese/Asian region). (you are a normal human soul)
(E) Play for less than 10 minutes and die in Prehevil region. (you will be reborn as a demon)
(F) It takes you less than 2 minutes to die.
(you will be reborn as a shadow)
(G) Do the Mango Mom Questline (You will be reborn as a human)
(H) Talk to the Lady of the Cathedral (You will be reborn as a rat)
(9) You won't die, you'll stay here forever.
(you will be reborn as a cat)
(666) Talk to Perk'lus (You will be reborn as a Lord of Hell)
(7) Complete Sophia's Quest (Reborn as an Angel)
(0) Shop at Fairy Fountain (You will be reborn as an animal)
(888) Any other option (you will be reborn as an insect/worm)

I'd like to thank my mom and dad for creating me.
Their names are Maurice Rose and Aine Suttle.
Thank you.
